languages.text: "{mf|Его|Ее} светлость примет правильное решение и накажет виновных — в этом можно не сомневаться".

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Его|Ее} светлость примет правильное решение и накажет виновных — в этом можно не сомневаться".

languages.text: "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits — you can be sure of that."
languages.original_text: "{mf|Его|Ее} светлость примет правильное решение и накажет виновных — в этом можно не сомневаться".

traits.locale_text: "Rest assured that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make a right decision and punish the culprits."
"Rest assured that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make a right decision and punish the culprits."
"Rest assured that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits."
"Rest assured that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits."
"{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits — you can be sure of that."
"{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits — you can be sure of that."

languages.text: 「陛下が正しい決定を下して犯人を罰してくださるのだから安心です。それは間違いありません」
languages.original_text: "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits — you can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下が正しい決定を下して犯人を罰してくださるのだから安心です。それは間違いありません」

languages.text: “放心吧，大人一定会做出正确的决断，严惩犯人。”
languages.original_text: "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits — you can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: “放心吧，大人一定会做出正确的决断，严惩犯人。”

languages.text: « Soyez assurés que Sa Seigneurie prendra la bonne décision et punira les coupables comme il se doit. »
languages.original_text: "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits — you can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: « Soyez assurés que Sa Seigneurie prendra la bonne décision et punira les coupables comme il se doit. »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady} tomará la decisión correcta y castigará a los culpables. De eso no cabe duda».
languages.original_text: "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits — you can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady} tomará la decisión correcta y castigará a los culpables. De eso no cabe duda».

languages.text: "{mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} wird die richtige Entscheidung treffen und die Täter bestrafen ... dessen könnt Ihr Euch sicher sein."
languages.original_text: "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits — you can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: "Seid versichert, dass {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} die richtige Entscheidung treffen und die Täter bestrafen wird."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, şüphesiz doğru kararı verip failleri cezalandıracaktır."
languages.original_text: "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} will make the right decision and punish the culprits — you can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri şüphesiz doğru kararı verecek ve failleri cezalandıracaktır."
